snippet: An agreement that could affect millions shouldn’t be discussed in the dark.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Prof Margot E Kaminski criticizes fact that draft text of Trans-Pacific Partnership Agreement has been designated classified by United States government; warns that enshrouding trade agreement negotiations in secrecy makes public debate impossible and allows powerful interests to have undue influence on proceedings; urges Congress to address secrecy of trade negotiations.
lead_paragraph: An agreement that could affect millions shouldn’t be discussed in the dark.

headline.main: Don’t Keep the Trans-Pacific Partnership Talks Secret
